cs.IT, cs.CR, cs.DS, cs.CC, cs.SI. 

The paper deals with the use of Reed-Muller codes for secret sharing in distributed storage systems, which is a topic that falls under the sub-categories of information theory (cs.IT), cryptography (cs.CR), and distributed systems (cs.DS). The paper also discusses error-correction, which is a topic in coding theory (cs.CC). Finally, the paper mentions information leakage, which is a topic in security and privacy (cs.SI).
